Class TomcatRequestUpgradeStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.web.socket.server.support.AbstractStandardUpgradeStrategy
      • org.springframework.web.socket.server.support.TomcatRequestUpgradeStrategy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RequestUpgradeStrategy

    public class TomcatRequestUpgradeStrategy
extends AbstractStandardUpgradeStrategy
    Tomcat support for upgrading an HttpServletRequest during a WebSocket handshake.

    4.0
    Author:
    Rossen Stoyanchev
